select cse.experiment_id as experiment_id,su.id as user_id, su.name as userName, c.name as className,er.status as status,er.iscorrect as iscorrect,er.submit_at submit_at FROM experiment_report er inner join sim_user su on su.id = er.user_id inner join chapter_section_experiment cse on cse.experiment_id = er.experiment_id inner join course_chapter_section ccs on ccs.section_id = cse.section_id inner join course ci on ci.id = ccs.course_id inner join class_course cc on cc.course_id = ci.id inner join class c on c.id = cc.class_id
and ccs.course_id = #{course_id} ::uuid
and er.status = #{status}
and er.isCorrect = #{isCorrect}
and (su.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') or su.id like concat('%',#{name},'%'))
and er.update_time >= #{startTime}::timestamp
and er.update_time <= #{endTime}::timestamp
group by su.id,cse.experiment_id,c."name",er.status,er.iscorrect,er.submit_at
